name: @thumbtack/thumbprint-scss
description: SCSS components for building Thumbtack UI
author: Tom Genoni <tom@thumbtack.com>

scripts.start: yarn clear && mkdir -p dist && yarn generateCss && yarn moveScss
scripts.generateCss: mkdir -p dist/css && node-sass -q src/thumbprint-css.scss dist/css/thumbprint-css.css && postcss dist/css/thumbprint-css.css --map --use autoprefixer cssnano --replace
scripts.moveScss: mkdir -p dist/mixin && cp src/thumbprint-mixin.scss dist/mixin/ && cp -R src/components dist/mixin/components
